projects.name: Showlist
projects.description: A simple & intuitive iPhone app to help people keep track of their favorite TV shows. Developed with a friend in Objective-C and Parse.com for the backend.

projects.name: ChatAround
projects.description: An app that lets you talk to people around you freely. Developed in Obj-C/Swift. The backend uses Node.js, MongoDB and WebSockets.

projects.name: MyContacts.io
projects.description: iPhone/iPad Contact Manager with advanced social and CRM functions. Developed as part of my last summer internship.

projects.name: Liveboard
projects.description: A real-time dashboard gathering data from multiple sources

projects.name: SquashPro
projects.description: A 3D trajectory simulator app for a squash ball popper. Developed in Java with OpenGL.
